title: Might be a dumb question
body:
How much mana regen does 200% base mana regen give per 60 seconds?  Sorry I am hilariously bad at maths. 
- it is for morellonomicon

replies.body: It depends on the champion obviously, but take whatever their base mana regen is and times it by 4.
200% base mana regen. If percentages are additive, then doesn't that mean you would times it by 3?

So, that means if you had 200% mana regen, you would get your base mana regen and multiply it by 2?

Wait no.

ugh

If you had 100% mana regen through items, then you would add 100% of your regen to that. So, if you had 100% mana regen, you would just multiply your base mana regen by 2. But if you had 200%, and then you added 100%, you would times it by 3, not 4, because it's your base mana regen times 300%. This is how I'm getting confused.
Twice the mana regen of 100%. Four times the mana regen of 50%.
Eight times the mana regen of 25%
